sentences.en: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.cn: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.en: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.cn: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.en: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.cn: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.en: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.cn: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

sentences.en: Germany and France pledged to maintain the differential between their two currencies.
sentences.cn: 德国和法国承诺保持两国货币之间的差别汇率。

sentences.en: He has the power to use force to maintain public order.
sentences.cn: 他掌握着动用武力维持公共治安的权力。

sentences.en: He should pay and maintain you as well.
sentences.cn: 他得给你钱，还得供养你。

sentences.en: His critics maintain that he's responsible for many of Algeria's ills.
sentences.cn: 他的批评者们坚持认为他应该为阿尔及利亚所面临的许多难题负责任。

sentences.en: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.cn: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.en: How can you maintain a family on 900 a month?
sentences.cn: 每月900美元怎么能维持一家人的生活？

sentences.en: It's hard to maintain competitive pricing.
sentences.cn: 维持具有竞争力的定价非常困难。

sentences.en: Jones and Armstrong maintain a consistently high standard.
sentences.cn: 琼斯和阿姆斯特朗始终保持着高水准。

sentences.en: Prosecutors maintain no deal was made.
sentences.cn: 原告坚持说不存在任何交易。

sentences.en: She could not maintain her balance and moved in a wobbly fashion.
sentences.cn: 她无法保持平衡，走路颤颤巍巍。

sentences.en: The authorities have said they will attempt to maintain essential services.
sentences.cn: 当局已表示他们将努力维持公共基础服务。

sentences.en: The company is responsible for maintaining public telephone boxes.
sentences.cn: 这家公司负责维护公共电话亭。。

sentences.en: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.cn: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.en: The house costs a fortune to maintain.
sentences.cn: 维修这幢房子花销不菲。

sentences.en: The idea is to maintain the regularity of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 问题就是要维持心跳的规律性.

sentences.en: The pilot throttles back slightly to maintain level flight.
sentences.cn: 飞行员稍稍减速，以保持水平飞行。

sentences.en: The psychiatrist must learn to maintain an unusual degree of objectivity.
sentences.cn: 精神科医生务必要学会保持超乎寻常的客观态度。

sentences.en: The superpowers pledged to maintain symmetry in their arms shipments.
sentences.cn: 超级大国承诺在武器运输方面要保持数量均衡。

sentences.en: You will now maintain radio silence.
sentences.cn: 现在请保持无线电静默。

words.tran_cn: 可维持的；可主张的；可维修的
维护，维修；保持；生活费用

trans.tran_cn: 维持，保持，坚称，维修，保养，供养
trans.tran_en: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

trans.tran_cn: 维持， 保持； 维修， 保养； 坚持， 主张； 赡养， 负担
trans.tran_en: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before
